legal_content_p1: This game is a fictional and satirical work inspired by classic strategy games and is designed for entertainment purposes only. While the game may feature representations of political parties, ideologies, or strategies, these are entirely fictional and do not reflect the views, affiliations, or endorsements of the creators or developers.
legal_content_p2: The creators of this game have no connection, association, or affiliation with any real-world political parties, organizations, or practices. Any similarities to real political entities, policies, or events are purely coincidental and should not be interpreted as commentary, endorsement, or criticism.
legal_content_p3: Players are encouraged to approach the game with an open mind and a sense of fun, recognizing that it is a work of fiction and not a reflection of real-world politics or ideologies.
